name: DropBlop
description:
DropBlop is an action puzzle game where Bob tries to keep his home clean by dropping various objects away from his home.

So far he is quite unsuccessful.

 Maybe YOU can help?

Controls are simple, you just need some arrow-keys/ a D-pad or a Joystick to play! ✨





Game made by Sebastian Lind

Music made by: Robby Duguay (Factory Refresh)
